effect.name: Drop Shadow
effect.description: Create a shadow effect from the alpha channel
effect.author: Meltytech, LLC

parameter.name: radius
Blur Radius
parameter.comment: The amount in pixel to blur the edge of the shadow

parameter.name: x
X Offset
parameter.comment: The relative horizontal position of the shadow

parameter.name: y
Y Offset
parameter.comment: The relative vertical position of the shadow

parameter.name: color
Color
parameter.comment: The color of the shadow including alpha
